info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:24PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Litchfield County through 500 PM EDT... At 423 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sherman, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Milford, Gaylordsville, Woodbury Center, Roxbury, Bridgewater, Hurds Corner, Merwinsville, Candlewood Springs, Kinneys Corners, Candlewood Point, River Road Reserve, Candlewood Trails, Hickory Haven, Pomeraug, Gaylordsville Station, Wellsville, Judds Bridge, Roxbury Station, Boardman Bridge and Lanesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
